column4: Is it possible I did something wrong during install? Doesn't seem like I had a lot of options to screw up.
I just don't understand what I could have done wrong during install though.
'spaley' is in the 'adm' group which I assume is admin, yes?
it should be admin, not adm
Can you think of any reason why 'spaley', which was created as part of the installer process, should not have automatically been added to the 'admin' group?
I think you can go into recovery mode, log in as root, and do 'adduser spaley admin'
ok, I'll try that. I'm using 7.10 server, btw.
what's the easiest way into recovery mode?
when I went into recovery mode, I"m in as root, but I tried 'adduser spaley admin' and got 'The group 'admin' does not exist.'
try editing /etc/sudoers with visudo in recoverymode
I think someone came in here before with a similar issue. Editing /etc/sudoers worked.
yeah, I did that, but now I"m worried what else is broken
